achievements.title: Winner at Softecâ€™19
achievements.description: Softec is an event held every year at FAST-NU, Lahore where contestants from different fields gather to compete. My University nominated me along with 2 juniors for the App Dev Competition. The competition was to build a mobile application similar to Netflix within 28 hours. Our team Hex Clanners developed the application using Native Android (Kotlin). We secured the first prize along with a cash reward of PKR 50,000.
